member.summary: Identifies the FontAwesome.Icon dependency property.

member.summary: Identifies the FontAwesome.Spin dependency property.

member.name: P:FontAwesome5.FontAwesome.Icon
member.summary: Gets or sets the FontAwesome icon

member.name: P:FontAwesome5.FontAwesome.Spin
member.summary: Gets or sets the current spin (angle) animation of the icon.

member.name: P:FontAwesome5.FontAwesome.SpinDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration of the spinning animation (in seconds). This will stop and start the spin animation.

member.name: P:FontAwesome5.FontAwesome.Pulse
member.summary: Gets or sets the state of the pulse animation

member.name: P:FontAwesome5.FontAwesome.PulseDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration of the pulse animation

member.name: P:FontAwesome5.FontAwesome.Rotation
member.summary: Gets or sets the current rotation (angle).

member.name: P:FontAwesome5.FontAwesome.FlipOrientation
member.summary: Gets or sets the current orientation (horizontal, vertical).
